Sara Cognuck bụ onye na-ahu maka ihu igwe si Costa Rica.
Na nwata, Cognuck biri na Peñas Blancas
Ọ bi na Esparza ugbu a.  Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Costa Rica

Ọ malitere ọrụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise.  Otu n'ime ọrụ ya malitere na 2015 ma ọ bụ 2016 mgbe ọ sonyeere National Council of Young Persons of Costa Rica nke bụ akụkụ nke mmegharị iji tinye ọrụ ihu igwe na Public Policy of the Young Person 20202024. Cognuck bụkwa onye nhazi nke Local Conference of Youth (LCOY) nke bụ ihe omume na-esote COP 25 na akụkụ nke Youth Constituency nke United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change nke ndị ntorobịa iri asaa sonyeere. Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị nnọchi anya ndị ntorobịa maka Declaration on Children, Youth and Climate Action.
